pageContext.claim: “One of the great disasters of all time in terms of trade and China's entrance into the World Trade Organization. They were flat lining and they joined the World Trade Organization which was actually meant for them.”
pageContext.analysis: The WTO was not created for China. The organization evolved out of the post-World War II economic infrastructure that the United States largely helped to create and foster. To a large extent, the international trading system embodied by the WTO has been very beneficial to the U.S. economy.
